mapper.insert: insert into question(questionnaire_id, order_number, title, type, is_required, create_time) values (#{questionnaireId}, #{orderNumber}, #{title}, #{type}, #{isRequired}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select id, questionnaire_id, order_number, title, type, is_required, create_time from question where questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId} order by order_number
